item.title: Create Responsive Shortcode
item.description: I am not a frontend guy, so it’s a little challenging to me to create an aesthetical site. However, I really want to fix a bug for my linkedin shortcode on my Hugo site. Before I fix it, it looks like: As you can see, the entire linkedin post is cropped, and looks very ugly. And here is what it looks like on my phone: I have to scroll down to see the important content of this linkedin post, which is really annoying on a smaller screen.
